abstract: Family of Kathleen Durst, who disappeared from her home on Lake Truesdale, NY, in 1982, requests that Surrogate's Court in Manhattan declare her dead; Durst disappeared after argument with her husband, real estate heir Robert Durst, and family has long expressed belief that he killed her; Durst's lawyers respond in support of family's request, though they deny murder allegations.

headline.print_headline: Family of Durst’s Wife, Who Vanished in ’82, Asks Court to Declare Her Dead
headline.main: Family of Robert Durst’s First Wife Asks Court to Declare Her Dead

snippet: Kathleen Durst’s relatives contend that Mr. Durst killed her in 1982, when she vanished. Her disappearance was the subject of the HBO documentary “The Jinx.”...
lead_paragraph: Kathleen Durst’s relatives contend that Mr. Durst killed her in 1982, when she vanished. Her disappearance was the subject of the HBO documentary “The Jinx.”
